situation.title: After-school clubs (Družiny)
situation.meta_description: Personal attendance of children in after-school care is not allowed until November 20th, 2020.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Personal attendance of children in after-school care is not allowed until November 20th, 2020. Because of the high risk of infection, in-person education is not possible at this time.

The exception applies to children of employees of selected professions (e.g. healthcare). For these children, there should be designated schools in their region.
